title: The Gangster Chronicles 1981
description:
The Gangster Chronicles 1981 [miniseries]

Dramatization of the lives of the three gangsters who founded organized crime in Prohibition-era New York City.

* Michael Nouri as Charles "Lucky" Luciano
* Joe Penny as Benjamn "Bugsy" Siegel
* Brian Benben as Michael Lasker [partially based on Meyer Lansky]
* Kathleen Lloyd as Stella Siegel
* Markie Post as Chris Brennan
* Chad Redding as Joy Osler
* Madeleine Stowe as Ruth Lasker
* Louis Giambalvo as Al Capone
* Jonathan Banks as Dutch Schultz
* Robert Davi as Vito Genovese
* E.G. Marshall as Narrator

VHS rip
A fair warning that the quality is pretty poor and the sound is very difficult.
Thanks goes to the original Ripper for sharing this
